definition: a periodically repeated sequence of events, to recur in repeating sequences
details:
noun
- a periodically repeated sequence of events
= example: a periodically repeated sequence of events
- a series of poems or songs on the same theme
= example: a series of poems or songs on the same theme
- the unit of frequency
= synonyms: hertz, cycle per second, cycles/second, cps
- an interval during which a recurring sequence of events occurs
= example: an interval during which a recurring sequence of events occurs
= synonyms: rhythm
- a wheeled vehicle that has two wheels and is moved by foot pedals
= synonyms: bicycle
- a single complete execution of a periodically repeated phenomenon
= example: a single complete execution of a periodically repeated phenomenon
= synonyms: oscillation
verb
- to recur in repeating sequences
- to ride a bicycle
= synonyms: pedal
- to ride a motorcycle
= synonyms: motorbike, motorcycle
- to pass through a cycle
= example: to pass through a cycle
- to cause to go through a recurring sequence
= example: to cause to go through a recurring sequence
